## Recap
Multivariate stochastic differential equation:

\[
d\mathbf{m}_i(t) = \left( A\mathbf{n}_i(t) + \boldsymbol{\xi}_i + B\mathbf{z}_i + M\mathbf{x}_i(t) \right)dt + Gd\mathbf{W}_i(t).
\]
